Name: Blood Moon
About the game: It was just like everyday. Until when everything changed. A beautiful yet strange world appeared as she decided to look around. What will happen in this place? An adventurous, story-based game Filled with grotesque and fearful factors Captivating graphics and scenes Decorate the house if you wish to know the girl's past A mysterious story hidden in various events It is up to you to decide how her journey will end
